Test.Name: Correct response (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse does not include Capabilities.Network.NTP

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported NTP feature is not supported

Test.Name: Correct response (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.NTP = 0

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported NTP feature is not supported

Test.Name: Correct response (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.NTP = 1

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported NTP feature is supported

Test.Name: NotAuthorized fault on the GetServiceCapabilities message without any authentication
Test.Description: DUT sends fault Sender/NotAuthorized on the GetSerciceCapabilities message without any authentication DUT sends correct response on the GetSerciceCapabilities message GetCapabilitiesRequest message with WS-UsernameToken authentication

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported NTP feature is supported

Test.Name: Other fault on the GetServiceCapabilitiesRequest
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT sends fault (exept Sender/NotAuthorized) on the GetServiceCapabilitiesRequest all Device Management, Security, and Discovery features will be marked as undefined. Items 5.3.2 Security support, 5.3.3 WS-Discovery Bye Message support, and 5.3.4 System logging support will be skipped in this case.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: not supported GetServices: supported All other features are undefined

Test.Name: No Response on the GetServiceCapabilitiesRequest
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT sends no response on the GetServiceCapabilitiesRequest all Device Management, Security, and Discovery features will be marked as undefined. Items 5.3.2 Security support, 5.3.3 WS-Discovery Bye Message support, and 5.3.4 System logging support will be skipped in this case.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: not supported GetServices: supported All other features are undefined

Test.Name: IPV6 not supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse does not include Capabilities.Network.IPVersion6

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported IPV6 feature is not supported

Test.Name: IPV6 not supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.IPVersion6=false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported IPV6 feature is not supported

Test.Name: IPV6 supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.IPVersion6=true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported IPV6 feature is supported

Test.Name: ZeroConfiguration not supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse does not include Capabilities.Network.ZeroConfiguration

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported ZeroConfiguration feature is not supported

Test.Name: ZeroConfiguration not supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.ZeroConfiguration=false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported ZeroConfiguration feature is not supported

Test.Name: ZeroConfiguration supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.ZeroConfiguration=true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported ZeroConfiguration feature is supported

Test.Name: DynDNS and IPFilter are not supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse does not include Capabilities.Network.DynDNS and Capabilities.Network.IPFilter

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported DynDNS feature is not supported IPFilter feature is not supported

Test.Name: DynDNS and IPFilter are not supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.DynDNS=false and Capabilities.Network.IPFilter=false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported DynDNS feature is not supported IPFilter feature is not supported

Test.Name: DynDNS and IPFilter are supported (GetSerciceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse message GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse includes Capabilities.Network.DynDNS=true and Capabilities.Network.IPFilter=true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported DynDNS feature is supported IPFilter feature is supported

Test.Name: Network features supported (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) GetCapabilitiesResponse contains: IPFilter=true, ZeroConfiguration=true, IPVersion6=true, DynDNS=true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported
IPFilter feature is supported ZeroConfiguration feature is supported IPVersion6 feature is supported DynDNS feature is supported

Test.Name: Network features not supported (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) GetCapabilitiesResponse contains: IPFilter=false, ZeroConfiguration=false, IPVersion6=false, DynDNS=false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported
IPFilter feature not supported ZeroConfiguration feature not supported IPVersion6 feature not supported DynDNS feature not supported

Test.Name: Network features not supported (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) GetCapabilitiesResponse does not contain: IPFilter, ZeroConfiguration, IPVersion6, DynDNS

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported
IPFilter feature not supported ZeroConfiguration feature not supported IPVersion6 feature not supported DynDNS feature not supported

Test.Name: Network features not supported (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) GetCapabilitiesResponse does not contain Capabilities.Device.Network element

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported
IPFilter feature not supported ZeroConfiguration feature not supported IPVersion6 feature not supported DynDNS feature not supported

Test.Name: NTP supported (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) DUT returns correct GetNTPResponse message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported NTP feature supported

Test.Name: NTP not supported (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) DUT returns fault on GetNTPResponse message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported NTP feature not supported

Test.Name: NTP not defined (GetCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities only is supported (DUT shall use GetCapabilities metod) DUT returns fault on GetNTPResponse message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: not supported NTP feature not defined
